mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_num, member_id, product_num, qty, order_dt, order_st ) VALUES ( orderSeq.nextVal, #{memberId}, #{productNum}, #{qty}, SYSDATE, #{orderSt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET order_num = #{orderNum}, member_id = #{memberId}, product_num = #{productNum}, qty = #{qty} WHERE order_num = #{orderNum}
mapper.select: SELECT order_num AS orderNum, member_id AS memberId, product_num AS productNum, qty, order_dt AS orderDt, order_st AS orderSt FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT order_num AS orderNum, member_id AS memberId, product_num AS productNum, qty, order_dt AS orderDt FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.product_name AS productName, p.product_num AS productNum, o.order_dt AS orderDt, o.order_num AS orderNum, p.price, o.qty, o.order_st AS orderSt, row_number() over(order by order_num desc) as rNum FROM product p JOIN (SELECT * FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) o on o.product_num = p.product_num ) b where rNum between #{displayPost} and #{postNum} order by rNum desc
